 Although New One-Armed Swordsman isnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t quite up to snuff with the preceding films, nifty action scenes and charismatic performances from Chiang and his co-star Ti Lung enliven the proceedings considerably, as does the filmÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s amusing homoerotic overtones.
